Package solidstack.cache

Interface Summary
ReadThroughCache.Loader<T> Interface used to load something.
 

Class Summary
ReadThroughCache A read-through cache.
SimpleCache The SimpleCache does things as simple as possible.
SimpleCache.CacheEntry A tuple of a value and an expiration time used to store the value in the cache.
 

Enum Summary
ReadThroughCache.BlockingMode Blocking mode.
 

Exception Summary
CacheException Thrown whenever something went wrong in the cache.
CacheTimeoutException Thrown whenever there is a timeout in the cache.
